Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'Night draws in, yet Constellia stays lively. Lamps of every color blink on, wrapping the streets in a warm, bustling glow.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Across the street, a mermaid focuses on a small stall, her profile frozen in the light like a still painting.'}
{3: 'Paper lanterns pile high, crowding around a sign that reads "Wishing Lanterns".'}
{2: '"Wishing Lanterns"? Are you interested in these?', 3: '11', 4: 'Got a wish you hope will come true?', 5: '11'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Ah,【kuroname】?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'When did you get here... Oh no, you saw me spacing out. How embarrassing...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'Wishing lanterns. Meaning: items that carry heartfelt wishes. Use: write or draw your wish on the lantern; candle heat lifts it into the sky.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid Vendor', 3: 'Double Seventh limited-time event. Couples only. Free stationery set included. May the two of you see your wish fulfilled.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mechanoid fluently finishes its pitch and hands over a large lantern gift box.'}
{2: '(Take the wishing lantern)', 3: '25'}
{3: 'Lamia studies your encouraging smile, trying to be sure of what you mean.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'So, 【kuroname】... you will make a wish with me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'There are so many people here. Could we find somewhere quieter to make our wish?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Sure, let's take a walk.", 3: '34'}
{3: 'She stays close beside you as you weave through the crowded street.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}
{3: 'Soon a quiet river comes into view. The bustle fades behind you, and a moist night breeze brushes your face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'This spot is perfect. The river breeze feels so nice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Then let's write our wishes on the lantern together.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Even in a quiet, distraction-free setting, Lamia stares intently at the lantern in front of her. But she still hasn't picked up her pen, and there's a hint of frustration on her face."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I have so many wishes... Which one should I write first?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Maybe next maintenance I could change my hair color? No, wasting a wish on something so small... feels kinda silly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I want to be smarter, prettier, stronger... No, I can't even picture that version of me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I also want to do fun things with 【kuroname】: walk in a park, watch movies, eat ice cream... But which comes first? I can't decide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Oh no... There are too many wishes! Whether I write or draw, they won't fit on one lantern.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'This is hard... What should I do...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia lowers her head, unsure what to do.'}
{2: 'Maybe start by thinking about nothing at all.', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Close your eyes and clear your mind.', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Eh, like this?', 4: '1'}
{3: "She isn't sure what to do next, but after only a brief pause, Lamia closes her eyes just as you asked."}
{2: '(Grab her hand)', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'What now? Hey, no tricks!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her hand rests in your palm, bringing you closer than before.'}
{3: 'Her eyes are shut tight, and her trembling lashes cast flickering shadows on her cheeks. She seems genuinely worried you might actually pull some kind of prank.'}
{2: 'Just relax, and then focus on the first image that comes to mind.', 3: '75'}
{2: 'Maybe that image is the wish you want most.', 3: '76'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Hmm, in that case... the first image I see...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Ah... if that's how it works, this will do nicely!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She opens her eyes and breaks into a smile, as if a decision has been made.'}
{3: 'Meeting your gaze, she blushes, hastily lifts the lantern, and blocks your view.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '【kuroname】... n-no peeking yet! Y-you have to think about your own wish too!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "W-we'll trade once we're both done, okay?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Through the lantern's thin paper you can just make out Lamia's focused face. She's bent over, completely absorbed in her drawing."}
{3: 'A gentle night breeze brushes your ears, and far-off festival sounds murmur in the distance.'}
{3: 'You turn to your half of the lantern and write a single line straight from the heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'There... that should do it. Can we swap now, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm finished too.", 3: '101'}

{1: "The mermaid takes a deep breath, then carefully turns the lantern so her side faces you—it's a drawing.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'A small room housing cute plush toys and delicate desserts; a girl with a fish tail stands at its center.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Beside her, hand in hand, is a figure that looks unmistakably like you.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'There are no words, but the slightly clumsy strokes already make her wish perfectly clear.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'And 【kuroname】 wrote...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "E-eek, you... you really... feel that way? I thought you'd write something else...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reading your words, she looks both thrilled and shy.'}
{3: 'Her cheeks flare red. She turns away awkwardly but keeps stealing glances, checking if you truly meant those words.'}
{2: 'These are my true feelings.', 3: '116'}
{3: 'After getting a reassuring answer, Lamia finally smiles. The shyness from before turns into a lively energy, and in the night, her eyes shine with a rare, radiant light.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I almost forgot! The vendor said our wish only comes true if we let the lantern fly.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She fumbles to fit the candle and lights it. The flickering glow reflects in her eyes like tiny stars.'}
{3: 'She gently lifts the lantern. In the dancing light, her drawing almost seems alive.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "Then... let's release it together, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Release it together with her)', 3: '127'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiCommon/FxUi2DLihuiFireGlow1000.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The lantern rises, carrying your wishes, drifting into the night until it blends with the stars. Lamia watches it go, smiling with silent hope.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiColorTableStageMain/FxUiColorTableStageRollStarLoop.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory784.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlinkNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You sit with her by the river, savoring the warm silence. Neither speaks, yet you feel her frame inch closer.'}
{3: 'It grows late. She seems tired and lies down, resting her head on your lap like a gentle kitten.'}
{3: "For a long while, the only sound is her soft, steady breathing. It gradually slows, as if she's already drifted into sleep."}
{3: "You carefully adjust your position so she rests more comfortably. She doesn't wake, only murmurs faintly."}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: '【kuroname】... the curtains in our room... what color do you like...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'If possible... I... still want to...', 4: '1'}
